::Reptilica::

Reptilica looks down at the seven bots, seeing that they wern't
firing. He swoops down toward them.

"Don't wait to be fired on, fire first!" he says, wanting them to be a
big part of the battle. Seven bots could help alot.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "*Orchid*" <ilovealllizards@p...> wrote:
> Armada/Blizzard/Fascino/Twister/Wrath/Venomous/Quake
> 
> 
> (The 7 step out of the shuttle, cautionly look around themselfs.
Each pull
> out a rifle and start walking around on the battlefield.)
